name: Silk Shelf-Stable Almond Milk, Unsweetened, Dairy-Free, Vegan, Non-GMO Project Verified, 1 Quart (Pack of 6)
short_description: ADD ALMONDMILK TO YOUR PANTRY: Plain, unsweetened almondmilk tastes great in baking recipes, with cereal, or on its own
SHELF-STABLE: Comes in special packaging for convenient, non-refrigerated storage.Beverage container material: Paper or Cardboard
DELICIOUSLY WHOLESOME: Dairy-, lactose-, and casein-free; absolutely no added sugar, soy, gluten, eggs, or MSG
A NUTRITIONAL ALL-STAR: 50% more calcium than dairy milk ; an excellent source of vitamin E; zero cholesterol; 0g saturated fat per serving; just 30 calories per serving
NON-GMO PROJECT VERIFIED, VEGAN-FRIENDLY ALMONDMILK with no artificial colors or flavors
product_description: Bring the creamy goodness of almondmilk to your pantry with Silk Shelf-Stable Unsweetened Almondmilk. Featuring a pure, silky-smooth taste and just 30 calories per serving, this unsweetened almondmilk is delicious whether it’s poured over cereal, added to your favorite recipes, or enjoyed straight out of the glass. It makes a perfect non-dairy alternative to milk, and is totally free of dairy, soy, lactose, gluten, casein, egg, and MSG. Silk Almondmilk provides vitamin E and contains 50% more calcium than dairy milk. And since it comes in special, shelf-stable packaging, this unsweetened nutmilk will keep fresh at room temperature, unopened, until the date code: no refrigeration necessary! Silk Unsweetened Original Almondmilk: 450mg of calcium per cup; reduced fat dairy milk: 293mg of calcium per cup. USDA National Nutrient Database for Standard Reference. Data consistent with typical reduced fat dairy milk.

name: Silk Soymilk, Original, Dairy-Free, Vegan, Non-GMO Project Verified, Half Gallon, 64 Fl Oz
short_description: The Original Nutrition Powerhouse: One 64 fl oz carton of Silk Original Soymilk is made with whole harvested soybeans grown by Mother Nature
Deliciously Wholesome: Plant based milk with 50% more calcium than dairy milk* per serving
Plant Protein: Every serving of this milk alternative has 8 grams of complete plant-based protein (16% DV)
Smooth and Nutritious: Vegan milk is an excellent source of Vitamin D to help support strong bones
Non-GMO Project Verified, Vegan-Friendly: Lactose free, gluten free, and dairy free milk alternative is free from gluten, carrageenan and cholesterol
product_description: Treat yourself with Silk Original Soymilk. Made with whole harvested soybeans grown by Mother Nature, this lactose free milk is the Original Nutrition Powerhouse. It's an extraordinary tasting plant based milk that you can use throughout your day. Every serving of this nondairy milk has 50% more calcium than dairy milk*, along with 8 grams of complete plant-based protein (16% DV). Silk Soymilk is totally free of dairy, gluten, carrageenan and cholesterol. Looking for lactose free cooking or baking supplies? Whether you’re making a healthy smoothie, making a bowl of tasty cereal or drinking straight out of a glass, trust Silk — the Original Plant Pioneer. Read more about our story on our packaging. Enjoy all of the Silk products, including vegan milk, non dairy creamer and dairy free yogurt varieties. *Silk Original Soymilk: 470mg calcium per cup; reduced fat dairy milk: 309mg calcium per cup. USDA, ARS. FoodData Central, 2022.

name: Silk Shelf-Stable Organic Soy Milk, Unsweetened, Dairy-Free, Vegan, Non-GMO Project Verified,32 Fl Oz(Pack of 6)
short_description: ADD ORGANIC SOYMILK TO YOUR PANTRY: Certified organic Soymilk is delicious whether poured over cereal, added to coffee, or enjoyed on its own
SHELF-STABLE: Comes in special packaging for convenient, non-refrigerated storage
DELICIOUSLY WHOLESOME: Dairy-, lactose-, and casein-free; absolutely no carrageenan, gluten, egg, peanut, MSG, or added sugar
A NUTRITIONAL POWERHOUSE: A good source of heart-healthy soy protein; low in saturated fat; zero cholesterol
NON-GMO PROJECT VERIFIED, VEGAN-FRIENDLY Soymilk with no artificial colors or flavors
product_description: Bring the creamy goodness of Soymilk to your pantry with Silk Shelf-Stable Unsweetened Organic Soymilk. Made with whole-harvested soybeans and zero grams added sugar*, this organic Soymilk offers great taste anywhere you typically enjoy dairy milk--over your cereal, in your coffee, or simply by itself. It makes a perfect non-dairy alternative to milk, and is totally free of dairy, lactose, carrageenan, gluten, casein, egg, peanut, and MSG. A powerhouse of nutritional goodness, Silk Organic Soymilk contains absolutely no added sugar and is a good source of heart-healthy soy protein.** And since it comes in special, shelf-stable packaging, this plain Soymilk will keep fresh at room temperature, unopened, until the date code: no refrigeration necessary! *Not a reduced calorie food. See nutrition panel for information on sugar and calorie content. **In a diet low in saturated fat and cholesterol, 25 grams of soy protein per day may reduce the risk of heart disease. A serving of Silk Unsweetened Soymilk has 8 grams.

EdenSoy is the first Soymilk in North America verified to Non-GMO Project Standards.
